dict.acceptation: 把…置于城堡中；（下国际象棋时）用车护（王）；

sent.orig: The lord of Blarney castle, near Cork, agree to surrender the castle to British troops.
sent.trans: 爱尔兰南部科克附近的布拉尼城堡的统治者同意放弃这个城堡交于大不列颠军队。

sent.orig: Saw castle like building on the way, was imaging my prince inside the castle.
sent.trans: 路上看见的城堡，幻想我的王子在里面。

sent.orig: The castle originally known as Lisbon Castle also offers a scenic view of the country's capital.
sent.trans: 这座原名里斯本堡的城堡也提供了国家首都的全景眺望。

sent.orig: The lord of Blarney castle, near Cork, agreed to surrender the castle to British troops.
sent.trans: 听信谗言的城堡的统治者，答应包围在科克附近的不列颠军队的城堡。
这座城堡充满神秘气氛。
